name: Ataph
culture_notes: Riveric dialect with Coastal Tongue loanwords
diet heavy on salted fish, seaweed and cured goods
public tide-rituals tied to harbor schedules
boat-building guild customs dominate labor rites
constraints: Ritual magic consumes scarce imported reagents
Long-range mind influence is rare and institutionally banned
No high-pressure steam industry; limited combustion tech
notes: State affiliation unknown; functions as small trade outpost on river
